title: MoxieTV is back!
body:
Well, not really. But here's a nice 13 minute long blooper reel! If your two loves in life are watching people screw up lines, and staring at me for long periods of time, then I think you might enjoy this.

MoxieTV Bloopers: Season 1
author: Dan

comments.author: nate
comments.body:
Posted By: justin..."hit me in the face with them!"


Aaah... that take me back.

comments.author: justin
comments.body: ...and that scream from me in the very last scene is genuine.  Dan hit me in the face with those hard, rubber snakes and it actually hurt pretty bad -- even though I clearly say, "hit me in the face with them!"

comments.author: justin
comments.body:
"Now I need to keep singing this song,
until some snakes jump on me, it won't be long.
*WAHH!*
...and then the snakes go on me.

...no...I shouldn't talk about the snakes."

comments.author: nate
comments.body: It is almost frightening how much this entertained me.

comments.author: Jonna
comments.body: Dan laughing, "That landed in my mouth!"

comments.author: erin
comments.body:
nicole!

i hate myself...

awww. darling. WE LOVE YOU!

very nice guys. i smiled big time.

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body:
HA!!!! That was hilarious.

I think I laughed the hardest at Nicole yelling at the geese. Oh my.
And Dan saying "just let me roll with it."
And Nicole saying "i hate myself..."
And of course the classic suicidal dummy.

Good times.

comments.author: EdMo
comments.body: We work for the dorkiest bosses ever....I love every minute of it.
